I Get the Idea!!!

TBA

Chapter:

1151

Japanese Title:

もういいわかった!!!

Romanized Title:

Mō Ii Wakatta!!!

Viz Title:

I Get the Idea!!!

Pages:

15

Release Date:

June 9, 2025

WSJ Issue:

2025 Issue 28
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →
Chapter 1151 is titled "I Get the Idea!!!".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Oni Child Yamato's Golden Harvest Surrogate Pilgrimage, Vol. 35: "Sumo tourney in Hakumai! Hurling Urashima's big brother, yokozuna Sukune"

Short Summary[]

As the chaos continues with the rampage caused by the demons and other monsters, Imu reveals to Killingham their plans to continue until the "Heart of Elbaph" has been subjugated. A flashback of the events from a few minutes ago occurs, where Chopper was able to save Gaban when he was falling and both had ended up in the Underworld where Luffy's group is. Upon learning of both Gaban's true identity, and the situation in Sun World, Hajrudin orders this crew to prepare to return to Sun World so they could save Elbaph, to which Loki states they will need his help for this situation.

Long Summary[]

Kashii begs the transformed captains to not kill Jarul because he is the world's oldest living giant and a hero of legend, but Brogy says it is because he has become so old now that they must kill him, and Dorry announces that once they do the both of them will take their places as Elbaph's new kings and bring about an era of war and ruthlessness. The giants try to contain the two of them but some of them get transformed into demons because of how close they are the two, prompting the rest to retreat. Ripley overhears that Gaban had been taken down by the enemy and starts rushing to her son's side. Unfortunately, the captive children are asleep once again, so Killingham (now in his hybrid form) can manifest more MMAs. He also starts reviving the ones that were downed previously, saying that now that Imu has taken the stage, he has no need to hold back. The captive Straw Hats watch as the country descends into chaos while the giants continue to try and save the children, with some of their mothers stepping in. Sommers asks Imu how long will this carnage last, and Imu declares they will go until the country's spirit breaks, also adding that if Harald had not messed up in the past, they would've conquered this country by now.

A few minutes earlier, Chopper curses himself for jumping off after Gaban without a plan, but he manages to get ahead of him and use Guard Point and save Gaban from the fall. Elsewhere, in the Underworld, Loki tells Hajrudin to beg him for answers regarding their father, but Hajrudin refuses. Luffy then senses that Chopper has landed somewhere, but even he does not know how he could tell it was him. Loki also senses them and the group decide to go out and find them while Gerd and Goldberg stay to watch over Loki. Loki tries to convince the two of them to unlock his chains but they refuse, just as Mosa contacts Loki. Mosa tells Loki that they will not be able to call him for a while, but they tell him that their conversations always helped him, which they wanted to thank Loki for. Mosa's words make Loki think they are in danger, but Mosa denies it as they hang up, leaving Loki worried. Gerd, who heard everything, tells Loki she is happy he found a friend to keep him company while stuck in the Underworld, but Loki tells her not to say a word about it.

Hajrudin and Luffy's group return and the former tells Gerd to get her medical supplies ready. Luffy tells Gaban that he is fortunate that Chopper was the one to save him, just as he is finally told Gaban's true identity as a member of the Roger Pirates, which leaves him stunned. The giants also tell the Straw Hats that Gaban and Rayleigh were considered Roger's "wings" and that Gaban was the third strongest of them, with Zoro coming to understand how Gaban was so strong when they fought him earlier and Luffy figures that Gaban does indeed know Shanks. Gaban does wake up (to which he retorts he considers himself the second strongest), and Chopper informs everyone about what is transpiring in the Sun World.

The group then sense Imu's immense burst of Haki, which leaves Gaban worried, and Hajrudin orders his crew to get back on the lift to return to the Sun World, with Luffy prepared to join in the counterattack. Loki, meanwhile, laughs that the immense Haki they just felt means they are going to have to set him free after all.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • The members of the Giant Warrior Pirates that have been turned into Demons continue their rampage.
    • Kashii tries in vain to convince his captains, Dorry and Brogy, to return to their senses, but to no avail.
    • Kashii watches as another member of his crew, Thormann, is transformed into a demon.
  • Killingham decides to unleash the full force of his MMAs now that Imu has arrived, as there is no longer any need to hold back.
  • Ripley learns of Gaban's earlier defeat as she prepares to save Colon.
  • The captive Straw Hat Pirates watch in horror, as Usopp is worried about Dorry and Broggy as they have abandoned their sense of pride in their current state.
  • Imu reveals they plan for the chaos to continue until the "Heart of Elbaph" has been subjugated.
    • Imu claimed that Elbaph would have been subjugated years ago had it not been for King Harald's "miserable failure".
  • A flashback of events from the last few minutes is shown:
    • Chopper was able to save Gaban from falling to his death with Guard Point as they both land in the Underworld. Luffy's manages to locate the pair after Luffy senses Chopper.
    • Luffy learns that Gaban was a member of the Roger Pirates.
    • Luffy's group learns about the situation in Sun World.
      • Hajrudin orders for the New Giant Warrior Pirates to prepare for them to return to Sun World so they can save Elbaph.
      • Loki, after sensing Imu's Haki, suggests that they will need his help to deal with the current situation.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


I went to a sky restaurant and a yakata boat with Iñaki, Emily, Jacob, and others from the live-action version. It was the best!


実写版のイニャキ、エミリー、ジェイコブ達と空中レストラン＆屋台船!!最高でした

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

==Cover Page==
[[Oni Child Yamato's Golden Harvest Surrogate Pilgrimage]], Vol. 35: "Sumo tourney in [[Hakumai]]! Hurling [[Urashima|Urashima's]] big brother, yokozuna [[Sukune]]"

==Short Summary==
As the chaos continues with the rampage caused by the [[demons]] and other [[Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Kirin|monsters]], [[Imu]] reveals to [[Rimoshifu Killingham|Killingham]] their plans to continue until the "Heart of Elbaph" has been subjugated. A flashback of the events from a few minutes ago occurs, where [[Tony Tony Chopper|Chopper]] was able to save [[Scopper Gaban|Gaban]] when he was falling and both had ended up in the Underworld where [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]]'s group is. Upon learning of both Gaban's true identity, and the situation in Sun World, [[Hajrudin]] orders this [[New Giant Warrior Pirates|crew]] to prepare to return to Sun World so they could save [[Elbaph]], to which [[Loki]] states they will need his help for this situation.

==Long Summary==
[[Kashii]] begs the transformed captains to not kill [[Jarul]] because he is the world's oldest living giant and a hero of legend, but [[Brogy]] says it is because he has become so old now that they must kill him, and [[Dorry]] announces that once they do the both of them will take their places as [[Elbaph|Elbaph's]] new kings and bring about an era of war and ruthlessness. The giants try to contain the two of them but some of them get transformed into demons because of how close they are the two, prompting the rest to retreat. [[Ripley]] overhears that [[Scopper Gaban|Gaban]] had been taken down by the enemy and starts rushing to her son's side. Unfortunately, the captive children are asleep once again, so [[Rimoshifu Killingham|Killingham]] (now in his hybrid form) can manifest more [[Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Kirin|MMAs]]. He also starts reviving the ones that were downed previously, saying that now that [[Imu]] has taken the stage, he has no need to hold back. The captive [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]] watch as the country descends into chaos while the giants continue to try and save the children, with some of their mothers stepping in. Sommers asks Imu how long will this carnage last, and Imu declares they will go until the country's spirit breaks, also adding that if [[Harald]] had not messed up in the past, they would've conquered this country by now.

A few minutes earlier, [[Tony Tony Chopper|Chopper]] curses himself for jumping off after Gaban without a plan, but he manages to get ahead of him and use ''Guard Point'' and save Gaban from the fall. Elsewhere, in the Underworld, [[Loki]] tells [[Hajrudin]] to beg him for answers regarding their father, but Hajrudin refuses. [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] then senses that Chopper has landed somewhere, but even he does not know how he could tell it was him. Loki also senses them and the group decide to go out and find them while [[Gerd]] and [[Goldberg]] stay to watch over Loki. Loki tries to convince the two of them to unlock his chains but they refuse, just as [[Mosa]] contacts Loki. Mosa tells Loki that they will not be able to call him for a while, but they tell him that their conversations always helped him, which they wanted to thank Loki for. Mosa's words make Loki think they are in danger, but Mosa denies it as they hang up, leaving Loki worried. Gerd, who heard everything, tells Loki she is happy he found a friend to keep him company while stuck in the Underworld, but Loki tells her not to say a word about it.

Hajrudin and Luffy's group return and the former tells Gerd to get her medical supplies ready. Luffy tells Gaban that he is fortunate that Chopper was the one to save him, just as he is finally told Gaban's true identity as a member of the [[Roger Pirates]], which leaves him stunned. The giants also tell the Straw Hats that Gaban and [[Silvers Rayleigh|Rayleigh]] were considered [[Gol D. Roger|Roger's]] "wings" and that Gaban was the third strongest of them, with [[Roronoa Zoro|Zoro]] coming to understand how Gaban was so strong when they fought him earlier and Luffy figures that Gaban does indeed know [[Shanks]]. Gaban does wake up (to which he retorts he considers himself the second strongest), and Chopper informs everyone about what is transpiring in the Sun World.

The group then sense Imu's immense burst of [[Haki/Supreme King Haki|Haki]], which leaves Gaban worried, and Hajrudin orders his crew to get back on the lift to return to the Sun World, with Luffy prepared to join in the counterattack. Loki, meanwhile, laughs that the immense Haki they just felt means they are going to have to set him free after all.
